accussed_details.name: Nisar Ahmad
allegation: Ownership of more than four acres of land, violating lease extension rules

complaint_summary: Petitioner challenged the cancellation of proprietary rights for 4 Kanals of land in Chak No. 488/G.B. by AC/Collector Samundri.
investigation_summary: Audit Officer of the Board of Revenue objected to the petitioner owning more than four acres of land, deeming him ineligible for lease extension beyond Rabi 1978. AC/Collector reviewed and canceled the previous order granting proprietary rights.
judgment_summary: The court upheld the concurrent findings of lower courts, dismissing the revision petition. It found no material irregularity in the cancellation of proprietary rights. The Additional Commissioner (Revenue) Faisalabad's order dated 13-3-1985 was affirmed.
punishment: Proprietary rights of the disputed land canceled; land resumed in favor of the State.
legal_arguments: Petitioner argued eligibility for proprietary rights based on prior notification.
Audit Officer's objection highlighted rule violations regarding land ownership exceeding four acres.
key_issues: Eligibility for proprietary rights under land ownership rules

legal_terms.Proprietary Rights: Legal rights to own and control property
legal_terms.Lease Extension: Renewal of lease agreement for a specified period

words_and_phrases.Concurrent Findings: Agreement in decisions across multiple courts

summary_vector_notes: Petitioner challenged cancellation of land rights due to exceeding ownership limits. Audit objections and lower court findings upheld by Board of Revenue.

judgment_order.summary: Revision petition against the order of Additional Commissioner (Revenue) Faisalabad dated 13-3-1985 dismissed.

details.initial_order: AC/Collector Samundri granted proprietary rights of Sqr. No, 55/5 measuring 4 Kanals in Chak No, 488/G.B. to petitioner on 27-8-1980 under Notification dated 3-9-1979.
details.audit_objection: Audit Officer of Board of Revenue objected that petitioner owned more than four acres of land, making him ineligible for lease extension after Rabi 1978.
details.review_process: Board of Revenue approved Audit Note via letter No, 475/ACC dated 3-3-1983, allowing AC/Collector to review and cancel the order dated 27-8-1980.
details.appeal: Petitioner appealed to Additional Commissioner, who rejected the appeal on 13-3-1985.
details.revision_petition: Petitioner filed revision petition, which was dismissed due to lack of material irregularity in lower court findings.
